level.text: Complaints charging conduct or activity by any public official, as defined in D.C. Code ยง l-1106.01(i)(l) (2006 Repl. Vol.), which is prohibited by or in violation of the Campaign Finance Act, as amended, shall be filed with the Board or the Director of Campaign Finance.
Upon the filing of a complaint, the Board shall immediately cause a true copy of the complaint to be made and served upon the respondent.

Upon the filing of a complaint alleging violation of the conflict of interest or financial disclosure laws, the Board shall promptly forward a copy of the complaint to the Director of Campaign Finance for investigation and the preparation of a report and recommendations or disposition in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 35 of this title.
